greets

Is that book in English? I have a very poor collection of non-English title.
Added to OD List. Will upload if possible ...

I know it's on French language "Janus: les deux faces de l'Occident" Maurice Duverger but I figure out that in English this book is translated like "Modern Democracies: Economic Power Versus Political Power" ??!!  Might be that this is the same book ?? Thanks for efforts mate :D
No, it's not the same book. That's completely other book from Maurice Duverger. I look for "Janus" if there's any on English :)

_F1_, you the best!!! I can't believe I have this book when I need it most. Thank you!! I am from Malawi-a small poor and poorly-governed country in  the Southern Africa and I would never get the chance to read this timeless piece which will help me influence a few.

This TPB community is meant to help each other. All we want in exchange is support. Support the uploaders with your valuable comments, support the downloaders with seeding back.
I know what poverty is and I feel proud to help you on time. You are helped - that is a success milestone of torrent community.
Best wishes and be around :)
_F1_ , thanks and keep up the good work. I don't want to make it a habit but since you encouraged me 'to be around' I have another wish to make: "The Meme Machine by Suzan Blackmore."

nyasangosi, if you feel you are bugging me by making continuous request - you are TOTALLY WRONG. Requests actually encourages uploaders and an uploader feel the same excitement uploading a requested content as the requester feels after getting the same. Only - don't get disappointed if any uploader fails to keep your request as nobody has everything in this world. A true file sharer will always try to keep requests, so, don't hesitate to make another.

Here you go:

Any chance you could upload "The Naked Ape" by Desmond Morris.  It came out in 1967 so I thought it would be in the public domain, but apparently the publisher has not stopped making money on it yet.
